hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Intraday Overreaction Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When approved meme coins (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) experience >8% price moves within 2 hours on social media hype (but no fundamental news), fading the move after 1-hour consolidation yields positive returns within 6 hours during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins driven by social sentiment exhibit sharp overreactions that often fade as attention dissipates. The 1-hour consolidation filter separates sustainable moves from ephemeral spikes. Works best when broader market isn't in stress regime.
entry_conditions: Social sentiment spike (trackable via API) but no exchange/ecosystem news
Price consolidates for 1 hour after initial spike (range <1.5%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% retracement of initial move OR +3% profit
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price breaks consolidation range by >2% in original move direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Social-driven moves continue trending beyond consolidation in >50% of instances with identical setup conditions.
